org.lobobrowser.request

Interface RequestHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractRequestHandler, ClientletRequestHandler, RedirectRequestHandler, SimpleRequestHandler

    public interface RequestHandler
    The Interface RequestHandler.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void cancel()
      Cancel.
      HostnameVerifier getHostnameVerifier()
      Gets a hostname verifier used when an HTTPS host does not match the cerificate information.
      String getLatestRequestMethod()
      Gets the actual request method, which may be different from the method of the original request.
      URL getLatestRequestURL()
      Gets the actual request URL, which may be different from the URL of the original request.

      Gets the request.
      RequestType getRequestType()
      Gets the request type.

      Handle exception.
